faqs.question: What documentation is required to purchase a Flat For Sale in Mithapur
faqs.answer: Essential documentation includes the Agreement for Sale the registered Sale Deed the layout approval plan from the local municipal body the Occupancy Certificate OC the Completion Certificate CC and proof of ownership chain from the developer. faqs.question: What is the significance of the Completion Certificate and Occupancy Certificate
